conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through the baffles and how it will be directed into containers E, F, or G.
Baffles A, B, C, and D are positioned at the top of the image.
These baffles will redirect the flow of liquid in different directions.
Liquid will flow down through these baffles and then into the containers below.
Liquid from Baffle A will flow to the left and then down into container E.
Liquid from Baffle B will flow straight down and then into container F.
Liquid from Baffle C will flow to the right and then down into container G.
Liquid from Baffle D will flow to the right and then down into container G.
Liquid from A will flow into container E.
Liquid from B will flow into container F.
Liquid from C and D will flow into container G.
Final Answer: Liquid from A will flow into container E, liquid from B will flow into container F, and liquid from C and D will flow into container G.
